Posts.Content: HI, I'm a male ,I know the pain that you're going through ! Mine was a tumor, the reason it burned & hurt so bad was,  that the tumor was growing my doctor operated right away ! on ascale 1-4 ,my cancer was 3.5 . They took off my left breast ,9 lymphnodes witch was cancerous I had 8 major chemos 33 radiations I was out of work 1 year ,I've been back since 1/25/08  If you can get it out do it /also go to another doctor ! So far I've really done great  ! Respond back to this page and I'll help all I can ! Please email me the info on the national cancer institue . It is................ Thanks ,don't ever give up , that's when it will gets worst < stress is really bad for it ! Don't give up life is to good !!!Thankyou
Posts.Title: I am about to give up.

Posts.Content: On 10/8/2003 Janis P. M. wrote: My husband has breast cancer. I would like some men talk about their bout with breast cancer. If their is a man out there who would share their, I would be ever so greatful. He has finnally settled down and accepting it . I am sure whsn he reads this he will be too happy to share his experiences. Looking to hear from someone soon. I'm from virginia,march 2007 ,I found out that I had a tumor in my left breast . After seeing 2 doctors ,the third one managed to take blood ,an ultra sound , an a mammagram . One week later a biopsy was taken ,I had cancer in my lymphnodes (9) of them . This was determined by surgery left breast taken off and (9) lymphnodes taken out. I've had 8 major chemos/ 33 radiations .I was out of work for one year, I NEVER gave up ! I made sure that every day there was something to keep me occupied ! I really had one of the best oncologist that was ! Most of all the best WIFE that GOD could give any man ! She stood by me through the entire event ' til this day she still does ! I've returned to work , I have lymphfodemia in my left arm ! It swells , but I continue to work So far there has not been a return of the cancer . But , I live for today not tomorrow ! If someone like to call me or email  , my phone (--Message edited by CancerCompass staff. For personal protection, email address and phone number removed. Consider private reply. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html-- ,TONY
Posts.Title: Healing Breast Cancet in Men
